creator: george@georgebox.org
text:
Directory listings are given a white background, regardless of the
user-specified colors in his or her browser.  This would not be a problem,
except they are given the user-specified font and link colors.  If the user's
colors are set up to be light-colored text on a dark background, then having
those light colors appear on a white background is nearly impossible to read. 
Either specify all colors or (preferably) specify none.

creator: slive@apache.org
text:
As far as I can tell, mod_autoindex generates a <body> tag with no options
at all.  I don't know why you say that it is setting the background color.

Thanks for using Apache.
